tool_description: This API that provides real-time update on global Climate Change News
name: Climate-Change Live Api 2023
title: Climate-Change Live Api 2023

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-api-2023.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-api-2023.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoints will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
